press_release.title: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Debuts End-to-End AI-Native Portfolio for Generative AI
press_release.summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise has introduced an end-to-end AI-native portfolio at NVIDIA GTC, designed to enhance the deployment and operationalization of generative AI applications.
press_release.content: Powered by HPE ProLiant servers and NVIDIA technologies, the portfolio includes co-engineered solutions with NVIDIA for optimized generative AI applications. HPE Services provides support in design, deployment, and management, ensuring efficient implementation of AI projects. The portfolio also integrates NVIDIA's AI software, aiming to streamline the AI model lifecycle from training to inference. Portfolio includes A preview of HPE Machine Learning Inference Software, An enterprise retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) reference architecture, and Support to develop future products based on the new NVIDIA Blackwell platform.
